def main():
    zb = sys.stdin.buffer.read()
    zs = zb.decode("utf-8", "replace")
    inf = json.loads(zs)

    total_sz = 0
    for upload in inf:
        sz = upload["sz"]
        total_sz += sz
        print("{:9} {}".format(sz, upload["ap"]))

    print("{} files, {} bytes total".format(len(inf), total_sz))
